attributes.action: apologies for the original Bloody Sunday  before the English Rugby team plays at Croke Park, Dublin.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On November 21st, 1920 Black and Tans killed entered Croke Park during the All Ireland final between Dublin and Tipperary and killing 14 Irish Citizen in cold blood.  We the undersign petition the Prime Minister to apologies for this act of terrorism against innocent people.

rejection.details: This game has now been played.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
